titles: The life of our blessed Lord & Saviour, Jesus Christ an heroic poem, dedicated to Her Most Sacred Majesty : in ten books / attempted by Samuel Wesley ... ; each book illustrated by necessary notes ... also a prefatory discourse concerning heroic poetry ; with sixty copper plates.
author: Wesley, Samuel, 1662-1735.
publisher: Printed for Charles Harper ... and Benj. Motte ...,
notes: Contains added engraved t.p. with title: The life of Christ.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
